channel.title: Login skills
channel.description: how to i make it so when a person logs in for the first time they get 99 slayer and slayer cape in inv.i think its in client.java but not sure

item.title: Login skills
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Well it was for the starter, nothing else.

Read full topic

item.title: Login skills
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“bbl111, post:11, topic:271146”]Well I also have a ddsspeced source and here is my code(it has 99 slayer in it just didnt want to waste time lookin for slayer cape+hood code)

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); addSkillXP(200000000, 18); addItem(1323, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(884, 100000); addItem(392, 100000); addItem(860, 100000); addItem(561, 100000); addItem(995, 10000000); addItem(6570, 1); addItem(1387, 1); addItem(553, 1500); addItem(554, 1500); addItem(555, 1500); addItem(556, 1500); addItem(557, 1500); addItem(558, 1500); addItem(559, 1500); addItem(560, 1500); addItem(562, 1500); addItem(563, 1500); addItem(564, 1500); addItem(565, 1500); q1=15; q2=15; q3=15; q4=15; q5=15; q6=15; q7=15; q8=15; q9=15; q10=15; q11=15; }

The q11=15 and such are the quest that are completed as a result of the starter. Hope this helps [/quote]
Or you could just put it in your player class, which would be more efficient.

Read full topic

item.title: Login skills
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Well I also have a ddsspeced source and here is my code(it has 99 slayer in it just didnt want to waste time lookin for slayer cape+hood code)

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); addSkillXP(200000000, 18); addItem(1323, 1); addItem(841, 1); addItem(884, 100000); addItem(392, 100000); addItem(860, 100000); addItem(561, 100000); addItem(995, 10000000); addItem(6570, 1); addItem(1387, 1); addItem(553, 1500); addItem(554, 1500); addItem(555, 1500); addItem(556, 1500); addItem(557, 1500); addItem(558, 1500); addItem(559, 1500); addItem(560, 1500); addItem(562, 1500); addItem(563, 1500); addItem(564, 1500); addItem(565, 1500); q1=15; q2=15; q3=15; q4=15; q5=15; q6=15; q7=15; q8=15; q9=15; q10=15; q11=15; }

The q11=15 and such are the quest that are completed as a result of the starter. Hope this helps
